memberdef.definition: void(* s_gemv_f32) (const float *, const float *, float *, size_t, size_t, const float *, size_t)
memberdef.argsstring: )(const float *, const float *, float *, size_t, size_t, const float *, size_t)
memberdef.name: s_gemv_f32

detaileddescription.para: Set by ie_kernels_install. ie_gemv_f32 will call install lazily if needed.

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *W, const float *x, float *y, size_t rows, size_t cols, const float *bias, size_t blk_k)
memberdef.name: ie_gemv_f32_avx2_impl

detaileddescription.para:
W
Weights (row-major or blocked-K contiguous per row).
x
Input vector (length cols).
y
Output vector (length rows).
rows
Number of rows.
cols
Number of columns.
bias
Optional bias (length rows) or NULL.
blk_k
Column block size; 0 disables blocking.
AVX2/FMA GEMV (fp32), provided by gemv_avx2.c.
Streams each row of W linearly and performs a dot product with x using AVX2 FMAs. Supports optional blocked-K traversal via blk_k.

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *W, const int8_t *x_q, float *y, size_t rows, size_t cols, const float *bias, size_t blk_k, ie_act_i8_params params, int symmetric)
memberdef.name: ie_gemv_qi8_f32_avx2_impl

briefdescription.para: AVX2/FMA GEMV with per-tensor INT8 activations, provided by gemv_avx2.c.

detaileddescription.para:
W
Weights (float).
x_q
INT8 activations (length cols).
y
Output (float, length rows).
rows
Number of rows.
cols
Number of columns.
bias
Optional bias or NULL.
blk_k
Column block size; 0 disables blocking.
params
Per-tensor INT8 parameters.
symmetric
Informational flag.
AVX2/FMA GEMV with per-tensor INT8 activations, provided by gemv_avx2.c.
Dequantizes x_q into a temporary 64-byte aligned float buffer, then calls ie_gemv_f32_avx2_impl. The temp buffer is freed before returning.

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *W, const float *x, float *y, size_t rows, size_t cols, const float *bias, size_t blk_k)
memberdef.name: gemv_generic_impl

briefdescription.para: Generic C GEMV: y = W * x (+bias), optional blocked-K traversal.

detaileddescription.para: Baseline portable implementation. W is treated as row-major with rows*cols elements. When blk_k > 0, the inner loop traverses columns in blocks of BK.

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *W, const int8_t *x_q, float *y, size_t rows, size_t cols, const float *bias, size_t blk_k, ie_act_i8_params params, int symmetric)
memberdef.name: gemv_qi8_f32_fused_c_impl

briefdescription.para: GEMV with per-tensor INT8 activations (fused dequantization), C path.

detaileddescription.para: Interprets INT8 activations with: real = params.scale * (q - params.zero_point) and multiplies float weights by decoded values without materializing x.

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *W, const int8_t *x_q, float *y, size_t rows, size_t cols, const float *bias, size_t blk_k, size_t group_size, const float *scales, const int8_t *zeros, int symmetric)
memberdef.name: gemv_qi8pg_f32_fused_c_impl

briefdescription.para: GEMV with per-group INT8 activations (fused dequantization), C path.

detaileddescription.para: Each element uses group parameters: g = index / group_size real = scales[g] * (q - zeros[g])

briefdescription.para: Decode FP8 E4M3 byte to float.

detaileddescription.para: Software decode with flush-to-zero for exp==0. Uses exponent bias 7.

briefdescription.para: Decode FP8 E5M2 byte to float.

listitem.para: exp==all ones: returns Inf for man==0, quiet NaN otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Install the best available fp32 GEMV kernel.

detaileddescription.para: Install the best available CPU kernels for this process.
On x86 (GCC/Clang), installs the AVX2/FMA implementation when allowed and supported by the CPU. Otherwise, installs the generic C fallback.

parameterdescription.para: Non-zero to allow selecting AVX2/FMA implementation.

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *W, const float *x, float *y, size_t rows, size_t cols, const float *bias, size_t blk_k)
memberdef.name: ie_gemv_f32

briefdescription.para: Dispatch fp32 GEMV to the installed implementation.

detaileddescription.para: If kernels were not installed yet, calls ie_kernels_install with AVX2 enabled.

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *W, const int8_t *x_q, float *y, size_t rows, size_t cols, const float *bias, size_t blk_k, ie_act_i8_params params, int symmetric)
memberdef.name: ie_gemv_qi8_f32

detaileddescription.para: GEMV with per-tensor INT8 activations (fused dequantization).
Uses AVX2/FMA implementation when available; otherwise uses the C fused path.

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *W, const int8_t *x_q, float *y, size_t rows, size_t cols, const float *bias, size_t blk_k, size_t group_size, const float *scales, const int8_t *zeros, int symmetric)
memberdef.name: ie_gemv_qi8pg_f32

briefdescription.para: GEMV with per-group INT8 activations (portable C implementation).

detaileddescription.para: GEMV with per-group INT8 activations (blockwise parameters).

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *W, const uint8_t *x_fp8, float *y, size_t rows, size_t cols, const float *bias, size_t blk_k, ie_fp8_format fmt)
memberdef.name: ie_gemv_qfp8_f32

briefdescription.para: GEMV with FP8 activations (portable software decode).

detaileddescription.para: GEMV with FP8 activations (software decode, fused).
